DOC.brief_summary: The aim trial investigate effect ingestion 75g glucose ( without phosphorus ) diet induced thermogenesis ( use indirect calorimetry ) appetite ( use visual analogue scale ) lean obese healthy subject
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Phosphorus Diet Induced Thermogenesis
DOC.criteria: Healthy Sedentary lifestyle Stable weight past 3 month On balanced diet Underweight ( BMI < 18.5 ) overweight/obese ( BMI≥25 ) age < 18 > 30 year Inability give valid consent Presence chronic acute illness . Elevated physical activity level ( assess physical activity questionnaire ) Heavy smoker ( ≥1 pack per day ) . Weight gain loss > 3 % past 3 month History kidney stone
